lead_paragraph: The collapse in oil prices has left oil-reliant Alaska with a multibillion-dollar budget deficit and few palatable options for digging its way out.

headline.print_headline: Alaska Faces a Clear Budget Deficit Without an Evident Solution
headline.main: Alaska Faces a Clear Budget Deficit Without an Evident Solution

snippet: The collapse in oil prices has left oil-reliant Alaska with a multibillion-dollar budget deficit and few palatable options for digging its way out.
abstract: Alaska faces multi-billion dollar budget deficit, largely due to drastic drop in oil prices, that could affect state's credit rating if legislators are unable reach consensus ahead of impending deadline; propositions include raising taxes or drawing from Alaska Permanent Fund.
